description: Test in-text annotation for use of restricted properties (#914, `wgContLang=en`, `wgLang=en`)

setup.contents: [[Has date::1 Jan 1970]] {{#set:|Has date=1 Jan 1970}} {{#subobject:|Has date=1 Jan 1970}}
[[Modification date::1 Jan 1970]] {{#set:|Modification date=1 Jan 1970}} {{#subobject:|Modification date=1 Jan 1970}}

tests.about: #1 verify no free annotation using Modification date (_MDAT) is created by the system
tests.subject: Modification-date

to-contain: Property "Modification date" has a restricted application area and cannot be used as annotation property by a user.

tests.about: #2 verify no free annotation using Has query
tests.subject: Has-query

to-contain: Property "Has query" has a restricted application area and cannot be used as annotation property by a user.

tests.about: #3 verify no free annotation using Has subobject
tests.subject: Has-subobject

to-contain: Property "Has subobject" has a restricted application area and cannot be used as annotation property by a user.

tests.about: #4 error on [[ ...]](NS_MAIN) with restricted declarative property
tests.subject: Example/P0101/5#_ERR20a1185193cbb57b6472d45844e0abbe

tests.about: #5 error on #set(NS_MAIN) with restricted declarative property
tests.subject: Example/P0101/6#_ERR20a1185193cbb57b6472d45844e0abbe
